New Records: Mark Chapman scored an unbeaten 87 off 42 balls, including nine fours and four sixes.
Shadab Khan top-scored for Pakistan with 41.
Key Match Events: New Zealand scored 40 runs off Shaheen Shah Afridi and Naseem Shah in the 15th and 16th overs.
Chapman and James Neesham secured the win with a seven-wicket victory.
Pre-Game Insights: Mark Chapman stated Pakistan's attack was strong and that chasing 179 was manageable.
Depleted Black Caps no match for Pakistan in second T20 was mentioned in a related story.
Post-Match Reflections: Chapman highlighted the team's resilience and the importance of the platform set by the opening partnership.
The coach highlighted the victory as a pivotal moment in their playoff push.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The fourth and fifth games are in Lahore next weekend.
